record.field: Team Building Workshop Request for 15 Participants in October

Hello,

I’m interested in organizing a team-building DIY workshop for a group of 15 people in October. Could you please provide information on available dates, workshop options, pricing, and any customization possibilities for our team?

Looking forward to your recommendations and availability.

Thank you!
Birthday Workshop Booking Request – “Upcycle Your Wardrobe”

Hi,

I would like to book the “Upcycle Your Wardrobe” DIY workshop to celebrate my birthday with a group of friends. Please let me know the available dates, pricing, and any special arrangements you offer for birthday parties.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Best regards,
